## Problem 1

library(readxl)

Importing and Cleaning Data

```{r}
TrashWheel = read_excel(path = "./data/HealthyHarborWaterWheelTotals2018-7-28.xlsx",
                        sheet = 1) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  drop_na (dumpster) %>%
  mutate(sports_balls = round(sports_balls, digits = 0)) %>%
  mutate(sports_balls = as.integer(sports_balls))
```
